context-param.description: Host HTTP header protection configuration. When enabled, please provide a list of trusted hosts (separated by semicolons). Each host must be a valid regular expression. Example: enableHostsAllowlist=true,hosts=host1.com;*.company.com;localhost:* This parameter is also used for the logout redirect parameter Although it is not recommended, you can add the scheme here like https://ibm.com or a wildcard *ibm.com
